path /v3/xlm/transaction
opid xlmtransferblockchain
params None
sum send xlm from address to address
reqBody
oneof
type object
props
fromaccount
desc blockchain account to send assets from
maxlength 56
minlength 56
type string
to
desc blockchain address to send assets
maxlength 56
minlength 56
type string
amount
desc amount to be sent in xlm
pattern ddd
type string
fromsecret
maxlength 56
minlength 56
desc secret for account secret or signature id must be present
type string
initialize
type boolean
default False
desc set to true if the destination address is not yet initialized and should be funded for the first time
message
desc short message to recipient it can be either 28 characters long ascii text 64 characters long hex string or uint64 number
pattern 064
type string
maxlength 64
required
fromaccount
fromsecret
to
amount

path /v3/xlm/trust
opid xlmtrustlineblockchain
params None
sum create / update / delete xlm trust line
reqBody
oneof
type object
props
fromaccount
maxlength 56
minlength 56
desc xlm account address must be the one used for generating deposit tags
type string
issueraccount
desc blockchain address of the issuer of the assets to create trust line for
maxlength 56
minlength 56
type string
token
desc asset name
type string
pattern azaz09112
maxlength 12
minlength 1
fromsecret
maxlength 56
minlength 56
desc secret for account secret or signature id must be present
type string
limit
desc amount of the assets to be permitted to send over this trust line 0 means deletion of the trust line when no limit is specified maximum amount available is permitted
pattern ddd
type string
required
fromaccount
issueraccount
fromsecret
token

path /v3/xlm/broadcast
opid xlmbroadcast
params None
sum broadcast signed xlm transaction
reqBody
schema broadcastkms
props
txdata
desc raw signed transaction to be published to network
maxlength 500000
minlength 1
type string
signatureid
desc id of prepared payment template to sign required only when broadcasting transaction signed by tatum kms
format uuid
type string
index
desc only if the signature id is mnemonicbased and you run kms v62 or later the index of the address to send the assets from that was generated from the mnemonic
type number
minimum 0
maximum 2147483647
required
txdata
type object
